item.description:
Join us for our June Medium & Large Breed Meetup!!

Who hasn't heard of Dancing with the Stars....now it's time for us to have our own four legged contest, Dancing with the Dogs! :)

Prizes for best outfits (owners and dogs), best dance, and others. (Thanks for the great idea Diane)

Please remember that EVERYONE must check in at the front desk and have updated VACCINES! As always, we require proof of Rabies, Distemper, and Bordatella.

All retail will be 20% off (excluding bagged dog food & Frontline).

Hope to see you all there!!
Angela
& Team at Best Friends :)
item.name: Med & Large Breed Meetup - Dancing with the Dogs
